sessiondvd
Interface pSession

All Known Subinterfaces:
iSession
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminSession, SessionManager
interface pSession

Provides privileged-operations interface for a DVD Rental System.

Author:
Developer: Shivam Kalra (100413064), Tester: Nishant Bhatt (100400174)

Method Summary
 void add(java.lang.String title, int quantity)
          Add more copies of an existing DVD and stores the transaction information.
 void create(java.lang.String title, int quantity)
          Creates a DVDs and stores the transaction information.
 void remove(java.lang.String title)
          Removes a DVD from the inventory and stores the transaction information.
 void sell(java.lang.String title, double price)
          Changes the status of a DVD from RENTAL to SALE and stores the transaction information.
 

Method Detail

create

void create(java.lang.String title,
            int quantity)
            throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
Creates a DVDs and stores the transaction information.

Parameters:
title - Title of DVD to be created.
quantity - Number of copies of DVD to be created.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalAccessException - When this method is called from STANDARD session.

         int quantity)
         throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
Add more copies of an existing DVD and stores the transaction information.

Parameters:
title - Title of an existing DVD.
quantity - Number of copies to be added to an existing DVD.

void sell(java.lang.String title,
          double price)
          throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
Changes the status of a DVD from RENTAL to SALE and stores the transaction information.

Parameters:
title - Title of an existing DVD.
price - Price of DVD for sale.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalAccessException - When this method is called from STANDARD session.
